name: Grave Domain
description: Grave domain clerics stand watch over the line between life and death.

1.name: Circle of Mortality
1.description: When you heal a creature at 0 HP, treat any dice as if they rolled the maximum. You also learn spare the dying, which has a 30-foot range and can be cast as a bonus action.

1.name: Eyes of the Grave
1.description: As an action, detect undead within 60 feet. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
2.description: Curse a creature, making it vulnerable to all damage from the next attack against it before your next turn ends.

6.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
6.description: As a reaction, turn a critical hit on a creature within 30 feet into a normal hit. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with cleric cantrips.

17.name: Keeper of Souls
17.description: When an enemy dies within 60 feet, you or an ally within the same range regains hit points equal to the enemy's Hit Dice. Once per turn.
